item.title: BYD bids Warren Buffett's Berkshire an unfazed farewell: Selling is 'normal'
item.description: As it confirmed Berkshire has sold the last of its shares, the Chinese EV maker thanked Buffett and Munger for their 17-year investment.

item.title: Anson Funds calls for Clear Channel Outdoor's sale. Here's why the timing may finally be right
item.description: The outdoor advertising company is now a U.S. pureplay, making it more focused and more valuable, and potentially easier to acquire.

item.title: These stocks including an industrial giant are close to forming a dreaded 'death cross' chart pattern
item.description: Several publicly traded companies' stocks are on the verge of forming a technical pattern that signals trouble ahead.

item.title: Here are the most overbought stocks due for a decline. Intel leads the list
item.description: Intel shares may be getting a bit long in the tooth, at least near term.

item.title: Forget the 60/40, here is what you need in your portfolio, says Bank of Americaâ€™s Hartnett
item.description: Bank of America strategist Michael Hartnett breaks down his 25/25/25/25 portfolio and explains why it is performing better than the 60/40 this year.
